issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: Last release before 0.10.0, will contain the features for 0.10.0, the time between 0.9 and 0.10.0 is going to be used to stabilize the release

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

versions.description: The release will stabilize core components, improve performances and adds new streaming algorithms. Unmaintained code is getting killed as part of this

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Clustering
components.description: Bugs related to any of the clustering packages

fields.description:
Streaming KMeans fails when executed in Sequential mode because it presently doesn't ignore 'logsCRCFilter' (in sequential execution).

{Code}

fields.summary: Streaming KMeans fails when executed in Sequential Mode

comments.body: Fix was to pass PathFilters.logCRCfilter() as additional parameter in the call to HadoopUtil.listStatus() in StreamingKMeansDriver.runSequentially().

SUCCESS: Integrated in Mahout-Quality #2365 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/2365/])
MAHOUT-1380: Streaming KMeans fails when executed in Sequential Mode (smarthi: rev 1551008)
* /mahout/trunk/CHANGELOG
* /mahout/trunk/core/src/main/java/org/apache/mahout/clustering/streaming/mapreduce/StreamingKMeansDriver.java
